author: mrflip

-- HUMAN RESOURCE MACHINE PROGRAM --
-- 23-The-Littlest-Number - SIZE 13/13 - SPEED 70/75 --

-- Tweak of @peterfreese solution adds one line but saves one op

    INBOX
    JUMP     d
a:
    COPYFROM 0
    OUTBOX
b:
    INBOX
    JUMP     d
c:
    ADD      0
d:
    COPYTO   0
e:
    INBOX
    JUMPZ    a
    SUB      0
    JUMPN    c
    JUMP     e
